main.name: Thomas Harrison
main.description: I have been working in Technology for the past five years at Travelers Insurance. During the first four years in their Technology Leadership Developement Program (TLDP), I had rotational roles as a Scrum Master, Security Architect, Software Engineer, and DevOps Engineer/Product Owner. I am now in my current role of DevOps Engineer/Product Owner as a TLDP graduate
main.bio: Tech enthusiast who enjoys reading, playing D&D with friends, breweries, and traveling the world.

testimonials.text: Who the hell is Tom Harrison and how did you get past security?

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Was in Delta Sigma Pi, a business fraternity focused on professional development, networking and community service. Was also Jonathan the Husky, UConn's mascot my freshman year.

work.title: DevOps Engineer & Product Owner
work.description: Determine stategic priorities for DevOps organization when it comes to AppDev customer support, automation, and self-service capabilities. Also highly engaged in the enterprise initiative of Software Engineering Excellence - particularly in creating an Enterprise DevSecOps CI/CD Pipeline.

work.title: Technology Leadership Development Program
work.description: Rotational Program that provided the opportunity to experience a breadth of roles. Also took part in internal committees responsible for recruiting and interviewing interns, charity fundraising through hosting a golf tournament, and technology education.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as Javascript developer for our Customer Identity and Access Managment group. Organized and facilitated Developer Coaching Sessions to educate engineers about systems, architecture, and technologies leveraged by Travelers.

work.title: Security Architect
work.description: Conducted security reviews for the procurement of third-party technologies. Assessed multiple CASB(Cloud Access Security Broker) offerings. Created Slack app security and tech governance guidelines.

work.title: Scrum Master
work.description: Facilitated meetings and agile ceremonies for team. Removed blockers and looke for process improvements through the analysis of Rally metrics. Maintained the project budget through resource allocations.
